comments: Took her class in the fall of \'09. Informative & helpful. Didn\'t really like the class. A lot of hw & tests were about 30 problems and the final was comprehensive. I might take her again for stat if she teaches it.

Took her class in the fall of \'08. Informative & helpful. Didn\'t really like the class. A lot of hw & tests were about 30 problems and the final was comprehensive. I might take her again for stat if she teaches it.
to hard. its just college alg. she expects to much out of her students. had to drop the class since im take 3 other ones. if you didnt get the chance to drop her class monday. SOL.

shes alright. knows more than she lets on, found out 1 day when she put up some crazy crap on the board and told us to solve it and she\'d give us a A if we get it right. she\'s an engineer major or somethin crazy. she is azn so guess it makes sense. haha gives out hw every class and quiz every monday. tough but shell help u out if u ask.
she knows her stuff but sometimes she talks 2 fast. really happy and excited about math but can be a real pain if u dont do the work the way she asked u 2

thought she was another student when i walked into class. find out that she\'s actually teaching the class when she got up and started calling out student names and passing out the syllabus. she has a sense of humor but can get sarcastic at times. if you just do the hw, the whole load of it, seems like you\'ll be ok
